item.trans: n. 先驱，前导 同义词:forerunner, vaunt-courier Crazing is the precursor of brittle fracture .出现小裂纹必然是脆性断裂的前兆。
n. 恩人；捐助者；施主 同义词:contributor, doner Scrooge later became Tiny Tim 's benefactor .斯克路基后来成了蒂尼·蒂姆的保护人。
vt. 超越；胜过，优于；非…所能办到或理解 同义词:overcome, top, exceed, cap, transcend He surpassed me in maths.他的数学比我学得好。

n. 三分法，人类三分（指肉体，灵魂，精神）；三断法，三相法 Based on the trichotomy of fuzzy theory a synthetic evaluation model was set up for structure capability of inhered road .从三分法的基本原理出发，建立了原有道路结构性能的模糊综合评价模型，并将其应用于实际工程的道路结构性能评价。
n. 山茱萸 adj. 山茱萸科植物的；淡黄褐色的 同义词:cornus, common macrocarpium fruit, fawn-coloured dogwood bud , pale green is inlaid with russet markings.山茱萸的蓓蕾，淡绿清雅，点缀着褐色斑痕。
n. [作物] 苜蓿；紫花苜蓿 同义词:lucerne, medick In this enlargement , barley , alfalfa , and sugar beets can be differentiated .在这张放大的照片上，大麦，苜蓿和甜菜都能被区分开。
vt. 合成；综合 vi. 合成；综合 同义词:compound, colligate Then he synthesized his statement before winding it up.结束陈述前，他综述了一下他的观点。
n. 故障；[地质] 断层；错误；缺点；毛病；（网球等）发球失误 vi. 弄错；产生断层 vt. （通常用于疑问句或否定句）挑剔 同义词:error, deficiency, defect, mistake, trouble, mistake, err in, carp at, trip up a performance which could not be faulted无可挑剔的演出
vt. 解除武装；裁军；缓和 vi. 放下武器；裁减军备 同义词:relax, demilitarize Japan was disarmed in 1945.1945年日本被解除了武装。
vt. 垄断；预先阻止；占先一步 同义词:corner, monopolize They forestalled any attempt to steal the jewels by having them moved to a safer place.他们把珠宝转移到了一个较为安全的地方，阻止了任何偷窃珠宝的企图。

n. 原生质；原浆；细胞质 同义词:bioplasm, plasmogen Shrinkage or contraction of the protoplasm away from the wall of a living plant or bacterial cell , caused by loss of water through osmosis .胞质皱缩通过渗透作用由于缺水引起的活植''。'细胞'。''或细菌的细胞质的皱缩或收缩，并与''。'细胞'。''壁''。'分离'。''。
n. [机] 滚筒；[机] 滚轴；辊子；滚转机 同义词:platen, tumbling barrel A 12 -year-old boy roller coaster at a Disney MGM park .一个12岁的小男孩在MGM迪斯尼公园玩云霄飞车的时候，见了上帝。
n. 造币；[金融] 货币制度；新造的字及其语等 同义词:monetary system, mintage The silver coinage was repeatedly debased with copper vellon .银币一再用铜币维隆来替代，实行贬值。
n. [生化] 合成酶 Glutamine synthetase ( GS ) is the key enzyme in the assimilation of ammonium in higher plants .摘 要：谷氨酰胺合成酶（GS）是参与高等植物氮同化过程的关键酶。
n. 战士，勇士；鼓吹战争的人 同义词:champion, fighter, brave The death of one warrior will not cast a cloud between them forever .尽管一位战士死了，但他们之间决不会永远蒙上阴影的。

adj. 补充的；追加的 n. 补充者；增补物 同义词:complementary, adscititious, enlargement Article The State shall encourage the employing unit to set up supplementary insurance for labourers according to its practical situations .第七十五条国家鼓励用人单位根据本单位实际情况为劳动者建立补充保险。

n. 性；性别；性交 vt. 生（过去式gendered，过去分词gendered，现在分词gendering，第三人称单数genders，形容词genderless） 同义词:sexuality, sexual intercourse On any measure of banks ' boards — experience , gender , age , independence — there were successes as well as failures .对于银行董事会的评估标准——经验，性别，年龄，以及独立性——有失败，也有成功。
n. 麻疯病；腐败 同义词:corruption, rottenness East Indian tree with oily seeds yield chaulmoogra oil used to treat leprosy .东印度的一种树，种子含油，可产大风子油，用于医治麻风。
n. 杀人；杀人犯 同义词:manslaughter Homicide by automobile is a special category of homicide recognized in some states .汽车肇事杀人罪是一些州所规定的特定类别的非预谋杀人罪。
n. 复苏；复兴；复活 同义词:reconstruction, renewal, revitalization They resuscitated an old man who fell in a faint.他们使一位晕倒的老人苏醒过来。
vi. 下毛毛雨 vt. 下毛毛雨 n. 细雨，毛毛雨 同义词:mizzle, drow It drizzled off and on all day.毛毛雨已经时停时续地下了一整天。

adj. 合格的，合适的；符合条件的；有资格当选的 n. 合格者；适任者；有资格者 同义词:qualified, applicable, becoming, shaped, likely, acceptee For instance , to obtain additional federal assistance for unemployment insurance , states must make more workers eligible for benefits , in particular part-time workers .比如为了获得联邦额外的失业保险救助，州政府必须让更多工人——特别是兼职工人——获得更多的救济金。
n. 柴油机；柴油；（俚）健康的身体 adj. 内燃机传动的；供内燃机用的 同义词:derv, oil engine Emergency diesel generators cannot make up for the loss of the grid , and cannot operate indefinitely .备用的柴油发电机不足以弥补电网的损失，并且不能无限期地运行。
adj. 停滞的；不景气的；污浊的；迟钝的 同义词:slow, dull If the economy remains stagnant , the Bank will probably be slow to remove the liquidity .如果经济仍继续停滞不前，英国央行将可能放慢消除流动性。
adj. 经济的，经济上的；经济学的 How could genuine economic freedom and equality of opportunity exist in such circumstances ?在这种环境下，怎么能有真正的经济自由和机会均等呢？
n. 针脚，线迹；一针 vt. 缝，缝合 vi. 缝，缝合 同义词:steek, seam, oversew, sew up to stitch two sacks together to make a curtain把两块麻袋片缝在一起权充窗帘
n. 支持；长枕 vt. 支持；支撑 同义词:holding, support, adhesion, backing, encourage, second, carry, hand, champion More timbers are needed to bolster the roof of the mine.需要更多的木材支撑矿顶。

adj. 丰富的，豪华的；苍翠繁茂的 vi. 喝酒 n. 酒；酒鬼 vt. 饮 同义词:abundant, grand, full, ample, plentiful, wine, liquor, knock over a drink, wine, liquor, drink, drink, inhaust With a bit more warmth and extra fertilizer , a plant can go from limp to lush .只要稍微温暖一点、再加上些许肥料，一株弱不禁风的植物就可以强壮茂盛起来。
n. 新生；再生；复活 同义词:reconstruction, fresh, revival, renewal The second big obstacle that a nuclear renaissance faces is the problem of waste management .核能工业复兴所面临的第二大难题，就是核废料管理的问题。
n. 内容说明书；样张；创办计划书 同义词:specimen page, specimen sheet Most had yet to plough through all of the financial information contained in the prospectus .他们中多数人尚未审议招股说明书中的所有财务信息。
adj. 白色的；白种的；纯洁的 n. 白色；洁白；白种人 同义词:stainless, pure, leuko, chalkiness Snow is cold and white .雪很冷而且是白色的。

adj. 意味深长的；雄辩的，有口才的；有说服力的；动人的 同义词:meaningful, affecting, significant, moving, speaking It is a succinct and eloquent defense of the basic philosophical principles of liberalism .它还用简明、流畅的笔触阐述了自由主义的基本哲学观点。
n. [数] 周期性；频率；定期性 同义词:cyclicity, vibration frequency The results show that the high -order effects destroy the periodicity of high -order solitons evolution .计算结果表明：高阶效应使高阶孤子的演化不再具有周期性特性。
n. 中途退学；辍学学生 He called the dropout rate " staggering ".他称这一辍学率是惊人的。
n. 快乐主义者；享乐主义者 adj. 享乐主义者的 同义词:epicure according to her it's bad to have high ideals , but good to be a hedonist !依她说，怀抱着高尚的理想是坏的，做享乐主义者是好的！
n. [化学] 臭氧；新鲜的空气 They think ozone in the air is keeping bees and other pollinators from smelling the flowers .他们认为大气中的臭氧会使蜜蜂和其他传粉者无法闻到花的味道。
adj. 错觉的；幻影的；虚假的；产生幻觉的 同义词:phantasmal, mendacious As Mr Turner notes , the promise of securitisation has turned out to be partly illusory .正如特纳所指出的，资产证券化的许诺，结果证明有一部分是虚幻的。
adj. 种族优越感的；民族中心主义的 A civilization that leaves behind forever the ethnocentric , tribal mentality .一个永远抛弃种族中心主义心态，部落心态的文化。
adj. 可分的；可分割的 同义词:partible, dissectible The integer 1 is divisible only by itself ; it is not a prime .整数1只能被它本身整除，所以不是素数。

n.
构架(工程)；框架，骨架，支架；结构
机构，组织，体制；体系
在框架上(或框架内、用框架)做成的作品
= frame of reference
The bodywork was designed and manufactured by CMB with wooden frame work .车厢以木制支框构成，是中巴自行设计及制作。
vt. 使疏远，离间；让与 同义词:release, convey Her behavior alienated her friends.她的行为使自己跟朋友们疏远了。
vt. 围困；包围；烦扰 同义词:eat, invest, case, burden The troops besieged the fort.部队围攻城堡。
n. 层级；等级制度 In the hierarchy of the Soviet empire , Chechnya was a backwater .在苏维埃帝国的阶级制度，车臣就是一潭死水。
n. 犯罪者；作恶者；行凶者 同义词:criminal offender, malefactor Only an insane person could perpetrate such a horrible crime.只有疯子才犯这种令人发指的罪行。

n. 功率；力量；能力；政权；势力；[数] 幂 vt. 激励；供以动力；使…有力量 vi. 快速前进 adj. 借影响有权势人物以操纵权力的 同义词:strength, ability, competence, regime, force, stimulate, bestir, make good time The aircraft is powered by three jet engines.这架飞机由三台喷气发动机驱动。
adj. 不相干的；不切题的 同义词:inconnected, unrelated Whether they are true or not is irrelevant .这些故事是否是真实，则无关要旨。
adv. 向前地；作用中，行动中；继续着 prep. 向，朝……；关于；在……之上；在……时候 adj. 开着的；发生着的，正在进行中 同义词:forward, antrorsely, towards, unto, at, concerning, about a glass on the desk课桌上的一只玻璃杯
vt. 使贫穷；使枯竭 同义词:pauperize, beggar a village impoverished by flood被洪灾弄得贫困的村庄
n. [内科] 血吸虫病 同义词:bilharzia This is the group of flat worms that schistosomiasis .这种扁平蠕虫是血吸虫病的病原体。
n. 剪裁，剪断；剪报，剪辑；剪下物，剪下的东西 adj. 头等的，第一流的；极好的，恰好的 同义词:cutting, tailoring, wonderful, excellent, famous, super, classical Her plait has been clipped last week.她的辫子在上周被剪掉了。
n. 兵变；叛乱；暴动 vi. 反叛；暴动；参加叛乱 同义词:rebellion, insurgency, rebel, revolt The mutiny in the Greek Brigade was also approaching a crisis .希腊旅中的哗变形势，也正在发展为一种危机。
vt. 预见；预知 同义词:predict, think ahead to foresee what will happen预知将发生的事件
adj. 冠的；冠状的；花冠的 同义词:cristated How HDL can protect the coronary circulation is not as yet firmly established.HDL究竟如何保护冠状循环，迄今还没有肯定的解答。
n. 客户；诉讼委托人 同义词:correspondent, client server software This isn't the type of clientele any restaurant wants to attract .对于任何一个餐厅，这不是他们想招揽的顾客。
vi. 推测；投机；思索 vt. 推断 同义词:guess, venture, understand, conclude This is the method that we have been speculating about.这正是我们一直在思考的方法。
adj. 瞬间的；即时的；猝发的 同义词:momentary, flashy A detonation instantaneous pulse of pressure outward in all directions .爆炸的瞬间会朝各个方向发出向外的压力波。
n. 罗望子；罗望子的果实；酸角 同义词:Tamarind Pulp Township government clearance tamarind .乡政府驻望子关。
adj. 实际的；真实的；实在的 adv. 真正地；确实地 n. 现实；实数 同义词:practical, actual, effective, sincere, honest, strictly, indeed, undoubtedly, authentically, actuality, praxis The real economy ?真实的经济？
adj. 生理学的，生理的 New and more sophisticated methods of physiological control should be available to the seed orchard manager .新的和更先进的生理控制方法，对于种子园管理人员将会有效的。
vt. 使加剧；使恶化；激怒 同义词:anger, aggravate to exacerbate ill feeling使恶感加深
adj. 党派的；效忠的；偏袒的；盲目推崇的 n. 游击队；虔诚信徒；党羽 同义词:political, committed, Guerrillas, underlings But in America it should not be a partisan issue .但是在美国，这不应是一个牵涉政党的问题。
n. 分，分钟；片刻，一会儿；备忘录，笔记；会议记录 vt. 将…记录下来 adj. 微小的，详细的 同义词:cent, moments, note, while, penny, tiny, strict, micro, detailed, particular I want my disagreement to be minuted,我要求把我的不同意见记录下来。
adj. 不透明的；不传热的；迟钝的 n. 不透明物 vt. 使不透明；使不反光 同义词:slow, non-transparent, devitrify Most importantly the corporate governance structure opaque .最重要的是，公司治理结构不透明。
adj. 无脊椎的；无骨气的 n. 无脊椎动物；无骨气的人 同义词:spineless, Invertebrate Zoology They disliked him only because he invertebrate .他们不喜欢他就是认为他意志较弱。

n. 音乐会；一致；和谐 vt. 使协调；协同安排 vi. 协调；协力 adj. 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的 同义词:accordance, unity, agreement, identity, keeping, coordinate with, attune, cooperate, sort They were able to concert their difference.他们能商议调解他们之间的分歧。
n. [临床] 症状；征兆 同义词:premonitor, prefiguration One symptom is bloating , or expansion of the abdomen area .一种症状就是肿胀，或者在腹部产生膨胀。
adj. 有节奏的；有韵律的 同义词:cadent, metronomic His breathing became more rhythmical .他的呼吸变得更有节奏了。
n. 律师；代理人 同义词:lawyer, deputy, agent, factor, secondary Then call attorney .然后就叫律师。
vt. 遭遇，邂逅；遇到 n. 遭遇，偶然碰见 vi. 遭遇；偶然相遇 同义词:confront, bring up against, fell in with, lit on, bring up against, run into She encountered an old friend on the road.她在路上偶然碰到一位老朋友。
vt. [法] 遗嘱认证；处以缓刑；加以监护；在遗嘱认证法庭证明…精神失常 n. 遗嘱检验；经认证的遗嘱；遗嘱认证法院管辖范围内的一切事项 adj. [法] 遗嘱认证的 to have to be probated必须检验的

adj. 最终的；极限的；根本的 n. 终极；根本；基本原则 同义词:final, organic, fundamental, radical, underlying, telos, fundamental principle Indeed , many college students do not select their ultimate career path until after they graduate .当然，很多大学生直到他们毕业才会选择他们的最终职业道路。
vi. 落下；变成；来临；减弱 n. 下降；秋天；瀑布 vt. 砍倒；击倒 adj. 秋天的 同义词:become, come, lower, reduction, decline, autumn, floor, cut sth down, autumn Apples fell from the tree.苹果从树上落下。
n. 男女平等主义者 adj. 主张男女平等的 Yet Candidate Clinton is not running as a feminist .但是希拉里并不是作为一个女权主义者来参加竞选的。
adj. 无用的；无效的；没有出息的；琐细的；不重要的 同义词:useless, small, unnecessary The word image futile unless it conveyed essential meaning about life .语言意象除非表达生活的本质意义，否则就没有价值。
vi. 渴望；立志；追求 同义词:rare, long for He aspired to become a lawyer.他渴望成为一名律师。
adj. 和蔼可亲的，亲切的 同义词:pleasant, friendly, sweet, benign Amiable Style : Human Resources Manager . Very people- focused .和蔼型：人力资源部经理、非常以人为本。
n. 计量器；标准尺寸；容量规格 vt. 测量；估计；给…定规格 同义词:batcher, measuring chamber, sound, scale, estimate A thermometer gauges the temperature.温度计测温度。
n. 天篷；华盖；遮篷；苍穹 vt. 用天蓬遮盖；遮盖 同义词:baldachin, marquee, blot out, overcurtain The sky was canopied with dark clouds.天空乌云密布。
n. [内科][中医] 哮喘，气喘 同义词:wheezing Or doctors may misdiagnose it as asthma or another infection .或者医生会误诊为哮喘或者其他传染病。

adj. 分裂的；分开的；有分歧的 v. 分开（divide的过去分词）；分离 同义词:separate, partite, uncoupled The teacher divided the class and took one section to the library and left the other to write an article.老师把该班分开，把一组领去图书馆，留下其余的人写作文。
n. 管弦乐队；乐队演奏处 Bill can play the piano , sing and lead his orchestra all at once.比尔能够同时弹钢琴、唱歌和领导他的管弦乐队。

adj. 不利的；相反的；敌对的（名词adverseness，副词adversely） 同义词:against, contrary, opposite, counter, cross A second error was that Japan tried to offset the adverse economic effects of a strong yen with over- lax monetary policy .第二个错误是日本试图用过度宽松的货币政策来冲销强势日元带来的负面经济效应。
n. 婴儿 同义词:baby, infant, babe Objective To explore the change of trace in body of neonate with pneumonia .目的探讨新生儿肺炎时体内微量元素的变化。
vt. 改变，使…变形；转换 vi. 变换，改变；转化 同义词:influence, fashion, vary, innovate, veer from, to change A little paint will transform this old car.喷点漆就能让这辆旧车变个模样。

adj. 有感情的；有感觉力的；意识到的 n. 有知觉的人 同义词:aware, conscious Sure , You fight Evil , but when Was the last time you showed a " concern for the dignity of sentient beings "?没错，你与邪恶作战，但你最后一次表现出“对于生命体的高贵品质的关心”是什么时候了呢？
n. 火山口；弹坑 vt. 在…上形成坑；取消；毁坏 vi. 形成坑；消亡 同义词:volcanic vent, dead hole, destroy, damage, recall His car cratered yesterday.他的汽车昨天坏了。
vi. 烧焦；打杂 n. 炭；家庭杂务 vt. 把…烧成炭 同义词:air burn, fetch and carry, chore, coal They are charring wood in a kiln.他们正在窑内将木头烧成木炭。

n. 及格；经过；护照；途径；[体]传球 vi. 经过；传递；变化；终止 vt. 通过；经过；传递 同义词:mechanism, protection, approach, transit, determine, drop, finish, vary, transit, clear, track, hand, transfer I pass the post office on my way to school.在我去学校的路上总要路过邮局。

n. 废止种族歧视 More than a century after the Civil War and 16 years after the Supreme Court's school - desegregation ruling , the American black has not achieved justice or equality .内战结束有一百多年了，最高法院关于学校种族隔离的裁决也有16年了，美国黑人仍不能享有公平与正义。
n. 兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行 vt. 使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与 同义词:like, fond of It interests me enormously.这让我感兴趣。

in the light from temperature and wind effects may increase their abscisic acid content some 40 - fold .同样，在光下由于温度和风的作用而萎蔫的植物，它们的脱落酸含量可以增加约40倍。

n. 地面；土地；范围；战场 vt. 使接触地面；打基础；使搁浅 vi. 着陆；搁浅 adj. 土地的；地面上的；磨碎的；磨过的 v. 研磨（grind的过去分词）；压迫 同义词:extent, boundary, region, spectrum, territory, area, strand, beach, to land, agrarian, earth's, oppressed The boxer grounded his opponent.这名拳击手把对手打翻在地。
adj. 等边的；等面的 n. 等边形 同义词:isohedral Use your protractor to construct an equilateral triangle .用量角器作一个等边三角形。
n. 邻近，附近；近处 They sense soil moisture in the immediate vicinity of the cup.他们能对直接接近林子的土壤水分作出感应。
adj. 含蓄的；暗示的；盲从的 同义词:suggested, undemonstrative Shear force is implicit in the development of bending moments .杆中的剪力在弯矩的推导中是不明显的。
n. [生化] 受体；接受器；感觉器官 同义词:ceptor, holding tank A particularly appealing one is the capsaicin receptor .其中最吸引人的目标是辣椒素受体。

adj. 相异的，分歧的；散开的 同义词:alien, dissimilative If you are now idly imagining dozens of uses for a brick or the novelties of a sleepless world , then you are probably a divergent thinker .如果现在你在随意想象出一块砖头的多种用途或一个没人睡觉的新奇世界，那么你大概就是一位“发散性“思考者。
vt. 阻碍；妨碍；阻止 同义词:dispute, let, stem, slow Heavy rain impeded our journey.瓢泼大雨阻碍了我们的旅行。
adj. 轻蔑的；侮辱的 同义词:scornful, sniffish A contemptuous smile flitted across Injun Joe 's face .印江·乔埃脸上飞快地闪过一阵鄙视的微笑。
n. 所有权；所有人 adj. 所有的；专利的；私人拥有的 同义词:ownership, holder, any, having, patent For years they have been using proprietary trading desks to take positions .他们花费好几年时间使用所有权交易专柜抢占位置。
adj. 家庭的；日常的；王室的 n. 家庭；一家人 同义词:domestic, family, daily, everyday, routine, family, race In India the starkest divisions are sometimes within the household .在印度，有时最明显的差别体现在家庭中。
n. 前途；预期；景色 vi. 勘探，找矿 vt. 勘探，勘察 同义词:scenery, future, picture, expectation, landscape, reconnoitre, make a survey to prospect a mine勘探矿藏
vt. 包含，吸收；体现；把……合并 vi. 合并；混合；组成公司 adj. 合并的；一体化的；组成公司的 同义词:involve, contain, absorb, comprise, merge, mix together, amalgamative, pooled to be incorporated a member of the union被吸收为工会会员
adj. 基本的；初步的；退化的；残遗的；未发展的 同义词:elementary, basic, fundamental, essential, primary What would be the utility of the rudimentary beginnings of such structures ?这种构造，在其最初的幼稚的阶段能有什么样的用途？
vi. 经营；进展；遭遇；过活 n. 票价；费用；旅客；食物 同义词:round, advance, passenger, food, fee, charge, diet He usually fares sumptuously.他平常吃得很丰富。
adj. 细胞内的 同义词:endocellular Herpesviruses bud from the nuclear membrane into channels that lead directly to the intracellular space .疱疹病毒是从核膜出芽经管状结构而释放到细胞空腔内。
n. 人工制品；手工艺品 同义词:artefact, handicraft works S. officials handed over the apparently artifact to Egypt 's chief of antiquities .此时美国官员将这具明显的走私品移交给了埃及的文物局长。

n. [法] 亲属关系，家属关系；亲密关系 同义词:family relation, consanguinity We have found that the addition of these kinship networks to the simulations tends to increase the overall population .我们发现，将这些亲属网络加入模拟实验之后，往往会使人口总数增加。
n. 敌意；战争行动 同义词:hatred, enmity Opposition to the war , he still thinks , explains much of the hostility to him .他仍然认为，对战争的反对可以解释对他的多数敌意。
n. [化学] 氧化物 同义词:oxyde However , it is not just penile blood vessels that oxide relaxes .然而，一氧化氮不仅仅是让阴茎的血管得以舒缓。
n. 收到；收据；收入 vt. 收到 同义词:income, proceeds, earning, receive from, to hand The cashier receipted the bill.出纳员在账单上盖上“收讫”印记。
n. 矩形；长方形 同义词:orthogon Make a rectangle with your fingers like this .像这样用手指做个长方形的形状。
